roles.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
bullets: Built the IT Skills Repository, a full-stack enterprise web app for managing employee skill profiles; deployed across Dev/QA/Prod using Azure DevOps pipelines with automated builds, task tracking, and rollback procedures.

Developed a responsive front end with React.js and Bootstrap featuring profile creation, advanced filtering, skill analytics dashboard, and admin features secured with OAuth 2.0 and role-based permissions through Azure Active Directory.

Engineered backend services using C# + .NET Web API with REST endpoints for skill operations, self-assessments, and approvals; protected sensitive endpoints using JWT and managed data with SQL Server.

roles.title: AI Trainer & University Ambassador
bullets: Completed 200+ AI-focused development tasks evaluating AI code written in Python, Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, C++, and SQL to improve model accuracy and prevent hallucinations.
Represented as a University Ambassador, referring 50+ student hires and hosting monthly workshops during the academic year; guided new contributors and promoted AI literacy across campus.
Led internal coding task reviews and collaborated with engineers to debug edge cases, enhance algorithm reliability, and mentor junior reviewers to improve QA across projects.

roles.title: Coding Instructor
bullets: Taught 20+ students foundational and advanced programming concepts in Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, adapting lessons to different skill levels.
Created and led 30+ hands-on projects reinforcing problem-solving skills (game development, web apps, data structures), maintaining student engagement and retention.
Mentored students one-on-one and in groups, focusing on logical thinking, debugging strategies, and end-to-end project development.
